100% Renewable Electricity

This year, PepsiCo is transitioning to 100% renewable electricity for its U.S. direct operations through a range of plans, joining its operations in 9 other countries.

Watch Now

Expo 2020 Dubai

Three limited-edition Pepsi cans, each representing a subtheme and carrying visually arresting and thought-provoking colors and designs, will be the first in a series of co-branded products to be distributed across several countries in the Middle East, North Africa and Asia.

Learn More

2018 Sustainability Report

We are refocusing our Sustainability Agenda on Helping to Build a More Sustainable Food System.

Learn More

Advancing Plastic Waste Reduction

By 2025, we aim to reduce 35% of virgin plastic across our beverage brands and avoid an estimated 67 billion single-use plastic bottles.

Watch Now

Explore Our Products

Curious about our products and their nutritional information? Check out our new page for details on our beverage, food and everyday nutrition products.

Explore Now
